name: Echoes of Tomorrow
reviews:
Beautiful visuals and a surprisingly emotional story.
A bit slow in the middle but the concept was fascinating.

name: Midnight Parade
reviews:
Kept me on edge the entire time!'
'Interesting premise but predictable ending.

name: Midnight Whispers in the Wind
reviews:
Touching and poetic, loved the soundtrack.
A bit too melodramatic for me.

name: Neon Skyline
reviews:
Cool fight scenes and cyberpunk setting!
Visually fun but lacked strong character depth.

name: Silent Harbor
reviews:
Loved the twists and the atmosphere!
Good pacing but the ending was rushed.
